title: Barbecued sweetcorn with red chilli butter and feta

instructions.step: Mix the butter with the garlic, chilli and parsley; season. Preheat a grill or griddle pan to high, or get the barbecue coals white-hot with no flames. Brush the cobs with the oil and cook for 8-10 minutes, turning every 2 minutes, until slightly charred.
Brush the cobs with most of the butter; cook for 1 minute. Brush with the remaining butter, scatter over the feta and serve with the lemon wedges for squeezing over.
